name: BlueprintConverter
title: Blueprint Converter
author: Adept
description:
Allows you to transfer a blueprint into a requester chest or character request slots.

Features:
0. Saving the request chest to manipulate it: CTRL+SHIFT+S (mouse on the requester chest)
1. Transferring the blueprint to the request chest: CTRL+SHIFT+V
2. Disposable requester chest: CTRL+SHIFT+D
3. Backup character request slots into a request chest: CTRL+SHIFT+B
4. Restore character request slots: CTRL+SHIFT+R (works with blueprints and requester chests)

[More details on the site!]
